title: 105_hr1701
content: National Interests in Rural Highways Act of 1997 - Amends Federal highway provisions to direct the Secretary of Transportation, for FY 1998 and thereafter, to increase and set aside an additional amount of Federal highway funds for allocation to States that: (1) have population densities of fewer than 25 individuals per square mile. And (2) comprise a land area of 10,000 square miles or more.
